translations: v．跺脚，重踩：用力地将脚猛地踩在地上。
· He stomped angrily out of the room.
他生气地跺脚离开了房间。

sentences.sentence: She stomped angrily out of the office.
sentences.translation: 她怒气冲冲，重步走出办公室。

sentences.sentence: He stomped out of the room in high dudgeon.
sentences.translation: 他愤怒地噔噔走出了屋子。

sentences.sentence: He turned his back on them and stomped off up the hill.
sentences.translation: 他转身不理睬他们，迈着重重的脚步走上山去。
